block-definition.translations: ko:micro:bit 출력 _ de:micro:bit Drucke _ pt:micro:bit Imprimir _ fr:micro:bit Imprimer _ nl:micro:bit Schrijf _ zh_CN:micro:bit 打印 _ zh_TW:micro:bit 打印 _ ar:micro:bit طباعة _ dk:micro:bit Vis _ he:micro:bit הדפס _ es:micro:bit Imprimir _ ca:micro:bit Escriu _ fi:micro:bit Näytä teksti _ sv:micro:bit Visa text _

block.comment: Storing the url response in a variable forces the block to wait for a response before returning.

block.l: const report_predictions = (prediction) => { let class_names = recognizer.wordLabels() let names_and_scores = Array.prototype.slice.call(prediction.scores).map((score, index) => [class_names[index], score]); //console.log(class_names) var predictionList = [] // This loop is for outer array for (var i = 0; i < names_and_scores.length; i++) { if (names_and_scores[i].length > 1) { predictionList.push([class_names[i],names_and_scores[i][1]]) //console.log([class_names[i], predictionList[i]]) } } window.prediction = predictionList //console.log(predictionList) }; const halt_execution = () => { alert("There was a problem making predictions. Check your URL and load your model again.") //Trick snap into thinking that the x key has been pressed world.keyboardFocus.fireKeyEvent('x') setTimeout(() => { world.keyboardFocus.removePressedKey('x') }, 1000) } if (typeof window.recognizer == 'undefined' || window.recognizer == null) { console.log("The audio model was not loaded.") halt_execution() return } // listen() takes two arguments: // 1. A callback function that is invoked anytime a word is recognized. // 2. A configuration object with adjustable fields window.recognizer.listen(report_predictions, {invokeCallbackOnNoiseAndUnknown: true}).then(() => { console.log("listening...") }).catch(error => { console.log("listen error:") console.log(error) halt_execution() })

console.log("Loading scripts...") window.scriptsHaveLoaded = false delete window.tf delete window.speechCommands delete window._tfengine let script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow/tfjs@1.3.1/dist/tf.min.js"; script.onload = () => { console.log("tfjs has loaded") let script2 = document.createElement("script"); script2.type = "text/javascript"; script2.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tensorflow-models/speech-commands@0.4.0/dist/speech-commands.min.js"; script2.onload = () => { console.log("speech-commands has loaded") window.scriptsHaveLoaded = true } document.head.appendChild(script2); } document.head.appendChild(script);
console.log("Checking if scripts have loaded...") return window.scriptsHaveLoaded

URL = URL.trim() const checkpointURL = URL + "model.json"; // model topology const metadataURL = URL + "metadata.json"; // model metadata const recognizer = speechCommands.create("BROWSER_FFT", undefined, checkpointURL, metadataURL); window.ensureModelLoadedResult = null recognizer.ensureModelLoaded().then(() => { console.log("ensureModelLoaded success") window.ensureModelLoadedResult = "Model loaded successfully" }).catch(error => { console.log("ensureModelLoaded error") console.log(error) if (error.message.startsWith("Failed to fetch")) { window.ensureModelLoadedResult = "The URL could not be reached" } else { window.ensureModelLoadedResult = error.message } }) // Set a global variable for the recognizer window.recognizer = recognizer console.log("recognizer registered")
console.log("Checking if the model has loaded...") return (window.ensureModelLoadedResult != null)

custom-block.comment: When you run this the first time, it will take a minute to start predicting. Press x to stop predicting.

block.comment: Click on this stack when you open the project.
